solution_line_template: Simon has picked a total of {blueberries_from_own_bushes} + {blueberries_from_nearby_bushes} = <<{blueberries_from_own_bushes}+{blueberries_from_nearby_bushes}={total_blueberries}>>{total_blueberries} blueberries.
This means he can make {total_blueberries} blueberries / {blueberries_per_pie} blueberries per pie = <<{total_blueberries}/{blueberries_per_pie}={num_pies}>>{num_pies} pies.
